About.title: About Me
About.text: I have skills in semantic, valid, adaptive, rubber, cross-browser, Pixel Perfect layout, using BEM, Sass, Gulp, Pug, Bootstrap. I have experience creating SPAs in pure JavaScript/TypeScript, but spend most of my time writing code using tools like React JS, Redux, Next JS, moduleCSS, TailwindCSS. I have basic knowledge of backend and experience in writing simple RestAPI servers using such technologies as Nest JS, Mongo DB, PostgreSQL. I also know how to use Docker, docker-compose and Git, GitHub
